nodes.text: Major Orten Ledes was a male officer in the Army of Light that fought during the New Sith Wars. Ledes was one of the highest ranking non-Force-sensitive members of the Second Legion of Light. He survived the climactic Seventh Battle of Ruusan, and was sent to the surface of the planet Ruusan by Lord Valenthyne Farfalla in order to fetch the Padawan Johun Othone, who had traveled to the surface against Farfalla's express orders. Ledes found Othone with two surrendered mercenaries from the Brotherhood of Darkness and took all three back to the orbiting fleet.
